data.message: So the whole of Scotland has to go to Glasgow to see this.... And people wander why we want to become independent we’re actually forgotten about the majority of the time... this makes me so sad

replies.message: Hi Rosie, the truck tour is a huge logistical challenge and takes our teams months of planning in advance with both councils and communities. In previous years we have visited many different locations across GB, but sadly, we can't visit every single one, each year. We can understand that you might be disappointed and will be sure to share your feedback with our teams
Coca-Cola it's disgraceful there is only two stops in Scotland. And both being in one city!

Coca-Cola I agree these things do take planning but looking at the map the tour concentrates on central and south England and doesn’t take into account the rest of the Uk, it’s not just Scotland you’re missing out. In past years it would start in Inverness and work its way down fairly throughout the UK. It’s just disappointing more than anything.

Wow!!! Can’t belive there is only 2 stops in Scotland this year and both in Glasgow. That’s so unfair. Come on guys who ever is planning these routes need a re-think for next year. I do understand you try to please everyone but for everyone to have to travel to Glasgow. You  can do better than that.
